subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pirela crashed into the center-field wall, allowing the Mets’ leadoff hitter in the first inning to score, and was taken to the hospital as the Mets beat the Yankees, 6-0, in spring training.
snippet: Pirela crashed into the center-field wall, allowing the Mets’ leadoff hitter in the first inning to score, and was taken to the hospital as the Mets beat the Yankees, 6-0, in spring training.
